name: Diamonds Aren't Forever
description:
Submission link: https://itch.io/jam/blackthornprod-game-jam-3/rate/895885

Diamonds Aren't Forever is a 3D shooting game made for the Blackthornprod game jam #3 with the theme "Less is more".  Destroy the rolling rock before it kills all the aliens! The less health the rock has, the more diamonds you earn! Have fun! And comment your scores!

CONTROLS
Left-Click on the Mining Lasers to Shoot

My second game jam! Special thanks to everyone who has helped me playtest the game! :) Definitely had fun and learned A TON from this process.

**Additional Credits to Rock and Environment Textures: taken from unsplash.
